stanza.line: Those hours that with gentle work did frameframe
The lovely gaze where every eye doth dwelldwell
Will play the tyrants to the very samesame
And that unfair which fairly doth excelexcel
For never-resting time leads summer onon
To hideous winter and confounds him therethere
Sap checked with frost and lusty leaves quite gonegone
Beauty oer-snowed and bareness every wherewhere
Then were not summer distillation leftleft
A liquid prisoner pent in walls of glassglass
Beauty effect with beauty were bereftbereft
Nor it nor no remembrance what it waswas
But flowers distilled though they with winter meetmeet
Leese but their show their substance still lives sweetsweet
